name: Spells For Sad Goths With Shitty Parents
name_original: Spells For Sad Goths With Shitty Parents
description:
Spells For Sad Goths With Shitty Parents is a short, interactive fiction game about being 16,  goth, queer, and having a rough time. Oh, and summoning a demon?

I made this game in half a day for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story jam. I really wanted to finish something, and I got really invested in my protagonist, so I just sat down and did it.

It's a really short game, but I had fun making it (I've never made a game before!) so I hope you enjoy!
